name: Joseph J. SCHUSTER et al. v. Antone S. CRUZ

parties: Joseph J. SCHUSTER et al. v. Antone S. CRUZ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The stay entered in this case on March 17, 1982 is continued until further order of this court.

attorneys: Pucci & Goldin, Samuel A. Olevson, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Leo D. Covas, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Joseph J. SCHUSTER et al. v. Antone S. CRUZ.
No. 82-108-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 1, 1982.
Pucci & Goldin, Samuel A. Olevson, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Leo D. Covas, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
